alert.note: Alert for Dickey; Foster; Kidder; La Moure; Logan; McIntosh; Stutsman; Wells (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 1:07AM CST until January 14 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST MONDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, life-threatening wind chills as low as 65 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...James River Valley. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon CST Monday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM CST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Wind chill values will fall to extremely dangerous levels, which could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes, and hypothermia shortly thereafter. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, with near whiteout conditions possible in rural areas.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. If you must be outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, dressing in layers and covering exposed skin. Keep pets indoors. If traveling, carry a winter survival kit and inform others of your travel plans. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Dickey; Foster; Kidder; La Moure; Logan; McIntosh; Stutsman; Wells
